channel.title: Need a 525 client compiler
channel.description: Need a 525 client compiler .. post 1 pleasE?

item.title: Need a 525 client compiler
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

Dude, just make one? Making a batch file is not hard at all.

EDIT:

@echo off
echo Compiling all files...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./src/*.java
pause

Incase your client was made differently, change “src” to the directory of your source code and change “bin” to where its compiling to. EASY.
Your JDK may also be a different version so you may need to change that.

All you needed to do is look at a compiler from another client and you could of found out how to make one.

Read full topic
